MAN.TITLE: diff

PARAM_ITEM.PARAM_DESCRIPTION: : vector or matrix (real, complex, sparse or polynomial)
: integer or character string with values "r","c" and "*" y : scalar or vector

DESCRIPTION.P: y=diff(x) compute the difference function y=x(2:$)-x(1:$-1)
diff(x,n,dim) is the n th difference function along dimension dim.
Default value for n is 1. Default value for dim is "*".
dim='r' is equivalent to dim=1 and dim='c' is equivalent to dim=2.
